page.title: 20HOMES,MYDDLE
page.content: The Glebelands are{Council}Houses. There are 12 white houses.They are made out of Bricks.They have a Livingroom,Kitchen,Lounge,Bathroom and three Bedrooms, and they have a small front garden, and a small back garden,The{Glebelands are quite big for Council houses.They are located near Myddle C of E School.They are also within walking distance of the Post Office, and the Pub.On the other side of them is St Peters Church and on the opposite side of the road to them is the lovely Vicarage. At the front of the houses there is a useful lay-by for cars to park. They are white pebble dashed and look quite attractive for Council houses.People will be buying or already have bought them. The Glebelands was built in about 1950.
